p:
Activation of caspases initiates apoptosis, and in particular caspase-9 is considered an important effector caspase responsible for programmed cell death apoptosis activated by CA-4
61
,
65
,
66 . The amount of activated caspase-9 was examined in MCF-7 cells treated with 12c. As observed from Figure 6(C), compound 12c at 50 and 250 nM produced about 8- and 16-fold increases in caspase-9 activation respectively when compared to 14-fold for CA-4 (50 nM). This finding confirms that compound 12c like CA-4 enhanced the rate of apoptosis in MCF-7 cell through caspase-9 activation.
